column4: Hello all, I am trying to burn one CD whit Brasero more then hour :) is it normal ? I am using Brasero for the first time.
how big is the iso? is it a dvd? how slow are you burning?
I am trying to burn Lubuntu.iso on CD 700 MB, on 10x speed
that shouldn't take an hour
I thing so but I am on creating a sum
what do you need help with?
My system cant read a txt files on my language
which language? what program are you opening the text file with?
the language is Bulgarian (Cyrillic ) like Russian and the gedit see only symbols
like this Äèøàé, äúëáîêî è áàâíî
those don't appear as symbols to me (but i'm on pcbsd9 at the mo)
they are symbols for me what should I do ?
i'm guessing here but you could look for language packs in synaptic, any bulgarian cyrillic one you haven't installed?
I will see what is going to happen in Synaptic
nothing happen still see symbols
did you install anything from synaptic? any more language packs?
and you restarted afterwards i guess?
I am trying to set subtitles  on my VLC
yes i did
hmm, most perplexing.. not sure what to suggest next sorry
ok thanks for try
